title: Powell on attack on American system - context

content.question: The ideas expressed in the memo were most consistent with which of the following foreign policy beliefs after 1945 ?

choices.label: A global capitalist economy led by the United States would help stabilize the international system.
A nonaligned movement would help balance out the communist nations in the global order.
Collective security alliances provided the best means to protect United States commercial interests.
The United States should unilaterally support postwar decolonization movements.

content.answer: A global capitalist economy led by the United States would help stabilize the international system.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
